questionTitle: These tennis courts don't _____ very often. Not many people want to play.
I'll get Minh _____ do this for you.
Those letters ________ now. You can do the typing later.
"What a beautiful dress you are wearing"- "thanks, it_____ especially for me by a French tailor."
Somebody cleans the room every day.
anwers: The room is every day cleaned.
The room is cleaned every day.
The room is cleaned by somebody every day.

questionTitle: People don't use this road very often.
anwers: This road is not used very often.
Not very often this road is not used.
This road very often is not used.
This road not very often is used.
How are languages learned by people?

questionTitle: Over 1500 new houses _______ each year. Last year, 1720 new houses _______.

anwers: That book was bought by Tom yesterday.
